creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Tigers are usually dismissed as simply lion-wannabes who couldn’t grow a mane, but they’re so much more than that! Combine the wildest tiger species in the jungle and you’ll quickly see that saber-teeth are the most vanilla perk a big cat can have!

Some of them have spring-like tails and famous bear friends, some enjoy long careers as morning cereal spokespeople, some become overused memes and some even play golf!

Welcome to the jungle!

WILD FEATURES

• Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
• Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the tigers

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and drop similar tigers to create new mysterious creatures
• Use tiger eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
• Alternatively, fiercely tap a tiger to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

• Different stages and many tiger species to discover
• A mind-blowing story with incredible twists!
• The unexpected mix of creature evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
• Doodle-like illustrations
• Various possible endings: find your destiny
• No tigers were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Don’t go for copycats! Tiger Evolution is the real deal!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: 🐯Mix crazy mutant tiger species and bring the rumble back to the jungle!🐯

• Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the tigers

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and drop similar tigers to create new mysterious creatures
• Use tiger eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
• Alternatively, fiercely tap a tiger to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

• Different stages and many tiger species to discover
• A mind-blowing story with incredible twists!
• The unexpected mix of creature evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
• Doodle-like illustrations
• Various possible endings: find your destiny
• No tigers were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Don’t go for copycats! Tiger Evolution is the real deal!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
descriptionShort: Mix crazy mutant tiger species and bring the rumble back to the jungle!

title: Tiger Evolution Idle Wild Cats

container.value:
Tapps Tecnologia da Informação Ltda
Rua Sapetuba 166

Brazil

creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Tigers are usually dismissed as simply lion-wannabes who couldn’t grow a mane, but they’re so much more than that! Combine the wildest tiger species in the jungle and you’ll quickly see that saber-teeth are the most vanilla perk a big cat can have!

Some of them have spring-like tails and famous bear friends, some enjoy long careers as morning cereal spokespeople, some become overused memes and some even play golf!

• The unexpected mix of creature evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
• Doodle-like illustrations
• Various possible endings: find your destiny
• No tigers were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Don’t go for copycats! Tiger Evolution is the real deal!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title:

container.value:
Tapps Tecnologia da Informação Ltda
Rua Sapetuba 166
São Paulo, SP - 05510-000
Brazil

creator: Tapps Games
descriptionHtml:
Tigers are usually dismissed as simply lion-wannabes who couldn’t grow a mane, but they’re so much more than that! Combine the wildest tiger species in the jungle and you’ll quickly see that saber-teeth are the most vanilla perk a big cat can have!

Some of them have spring-like tails and famous bear friends, some enjoy long careers as morning cereal spokespeople, some become overused memes and some even play golf!

Welcome to the jungle!

WILD FEATURES

• Pantheon: a new place for supreme beings to look down on us mortals and laugh at our misery
• Impostors: watch out for impostors trying to steal the spotlight from the tigers

HOW TO PLAY
• Drag and drop similar tigers to create new mysterious creatures
• Use tiger eggs to earn coins, buy new creatures and make even more money
• Alternatively, fiercely tap a tiger to make coins pop from their eggs

HIGHLIGHTS

• Different stages and many tiger species to discover
• A mind-blowing story with incredible twists!
• The unexpected mix of creature evolution dynamics and incremental clicker games
• Doodle-like illustrations
• Various possible endings: find your destiny
• No tigers were harmed in the making of this game, only developers

Don’t go for copycats! Tiger Evolution is the real deal!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.
